name: Deep Dive (soyeahimjames)
description:
My first successful Ludum Dare :)

Deep Dive.

Take control of a submarine, dive deep into the ocean to find hidden treasure. The deeper you dive the bigger the fish. The bigger the fish the bigger the score! 

Take care down there, and watch out for environmental hazards and the remains of adventurers past!

How to Play

Use the WAD keys to add thrust to the submarine. (Thrust requires fuel, keep an eye on the gauge)

Use the left mouse to fire missiles.
